publications.title: Generation of two induced pluripotent stem cell lines from a 33-year-old central core disease patient with a heterozygous dominant c.14145_14156delCTACTGGGACA (p.Asn4715_Asp4718del) deletion in the RYR1 gene

donor.disease_description: CCD is a congenital disorder that results in hypotonia, delayed motor development, and areas of reduced oxidative activity in the muscle fibre.

ethics.institutional_HREC: University of Western Australia Human Research Ethics Committee
